Question
========
Which statement accurately describes the relativity of simultaneity?

Answerlist
----------
* All observers in inertial reference frames agree on which events are simultaneous.
* Events simultaneous in one frame may not be simultaneous in another.
* Only events at the same location can be simultaneous.
* Simultaneity is absolute.

Solution
========
The relativity of simultaneity says that events that are simultaneous in one inertial reference frame may not be simultaneous in another inertial reference frame.
